453:
{
    "name": "build.com",
    "enabled": true,
    "selectors": {
        "cartTotal": "#cart-grand-total",
        "couponInput": "input#coupon-number",
        "couponApply": "#apply-coupon",
        "couponRemove": ".js-coupon-remove",
        "doNotApply": "div#page-content section.js-toggle-on-empty:not(.dn) h3",
        "error": "form#coupon-form label > span",
        "comment_couponApplied" : "couponApplied assumes check of 2 things error & couponRemove. Selectors must be named exactly",
        "comment_setTimeout" : ".js has extra setTimeout after couponApplied",
        "comment_couponRemoved": "doesn't exist, should it be, or should CouponAppliedConditionProcessor be more generic, maybe neither, maybe defaultRemoveCoupon will work..UPDATE, default worked"
    }
}
5763:
{
  "name": "Popcornopolis",
  "enabled": false,
  "shouldRefresh": true,
  "shouldCheckInitialElements": true,
  "selectors": {
    "cartTotal": "#shopping-cart-totals-table strong > span",
    "couponRemove": ".btn.btn-secondary.cancel-coupon",
    "couponInput": "#coupon_code",
    "couponApply": "#discount-coupon-form button[type='button']",
    "error":".alert-danger, .error-msg li"

  },
  "applyCoupon": "http-submit-form-coupon-input",
  "removeCoupon": "http-submit-form-remove"
}
